layman_description: Metal reinforced gloves that add punch damage to your melee strikes.
technical_description: Armor slot item with melee damage multiplier and equipped state.
player_impact: Increases your unarmed combat damage output.

layman_description: A protective suit that shields you from radioactive zones in the game.
technical_description: Full-body armor with radiation resistance stat and durability tracking.
player_impact: Allows you to enter irradiated areas without taking damage.

layman_description: Military-grade plating that absorbs lots of damage but is heavy to wear.
technical_description: Heavy armor class with high damage reduction and reduced movement speed penalty.
player_impact: Reduces damage taken but slows your movement speed.

layman_description: Simple leather protection that gives basic defense and is lightweight.
technical_description: Light armor class with low damage reduction and minimal weight penalty.
player_impact: Offers basic protection without slowing you down much.

layman_description: A hat that lets zombies think you're one of them so they ignore you.
technical_description: Head slot equipment with zombie-perception modifier and disguise effect.
player_impact: Zombies won't attack you if you wear it.

layman_description: A large pack that holds more items when worn.
technical_description: Back slot armor with inventory capacity modification property.
player_impact: Increases your inventory space when equipped.

layman_description: An air tank that lets you breathe underwater for a limited time.
technical_description: Equipment item with oxygen meter and underwater breathing enable state.
player_impact: Lets you stay underwater and explore submerged areas.

layman_description: A hard hat with a light source attached for dark areas.
technical_description: Head slot item with integrated light source and collision protection.
player_impact: Illuminates dark caves and provides head protection.

layman_description: A full protective suit that keeps you safe from toxic gases.
technical_description: Full-body toxic-protection armor with gas resistance value.
player_impact: Protects you from poisonous gas in contaminated areas.

layman_description: Footwear that reduces fall damage when you jump down.
technical_description: Feet slot armor with fall-damage reduction percentage.
player_impact: Reduces injury from landing after drops.
